attributes.action: consider the views of the younger generations before leaving the EU
attributes.background:
51.9% backed the UK leaving the EU but of the age groups: 70% of 18-24, 62% of 25-34 and 52% of 35-44 all voted REMAIN.
These demographics are the most affected by an exit decision. We ask government to give greater weight to the future generations of this country prior to any article 50 decision.

rejection.details: It's not clear how you would like young peoples' views to be taken into account.  You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like to happen.
